DESCRIPTION: Enable/Disable the autorole on the server!
MISSING_STATUS: Please specify a valid status! (`on` or `off`)
MISSING_ROLE: Please specify a valid role to add to new members!
SUCCESS_ENABLED: Autorole enabled! New members will receive the **{{roleName}}** role.
ALREADY_DISABLED: Autorole is already disabled. Enable it with `{{prefix}}autorole on @YourRole`!
SUCCESS_DISABLED: Autorole disabled! Type `{{prefix}}configuration` to see your new configuration!
